article_title: Nuggets sign guard Jamaal Franklin – The Denver Post
article_text:
The Nuggets signed guard Jamaal Franklin for the remainder of the season, the team announced Sunday.

Franklin appeared in 21 games for the Los Angeles D-Fenders of the NBA’s Development League this season, averaging 19.1 points, 8.9 rebounds, 6.5 assists and 1.48 steals per game.

Before his stint with the D-Fenders, Franklin played 26 games for the Zhejiang Guangsha Lions of the Chinese Basketball Association and averaged 28.5 points, 6.2 rebounds and 4.6 assists.

The 6-foot-5, 190-pound Franklin was drafted out by the Grizzlies (41st overall) out of San Diego State in 2013 and averaged 1.9 points and 1.1 rebounds in 7.7 minutes his rookie season.
article_summary:
The Nuggets signed guard Jamaal Franklin for the remainder of the season, the team announced Sunday.
Before his stint with the D-Fenders, Franklin played 26 games for the Zhejiang Guangsha Lions of the Chinese Basketball Association and averaged 28.5 points, 6.2 rebounds and 4.6 assists.
Franklin appeared in 21 games for the Los Angeles D-Fenders of the NBA’s Development League this season, averaging 19.1 points, 8.9 rebounds, 6.5 assists and 1.48 steals per game.
The 6-foot-5, 190-pound Franklin was drafted out by the Grizzlies (41st overall) out of San Diego State in 2013 and averaged 1.9 points and 1.1 rebounds in 7.7 minutes his rookie season.
